select count(*) from tag_owner,article where article.id=tag_owner.ownerId and tag_owner.ownerType='article'
and tag_owner.tagId=#{id}

select count(*) from article,article_category where article.categoryId=article_category.id
and article.categoryId=#{ArticleCategoryId}

select article.title as atitle,article_category.id as acaId,article_category.name as acaname,article.publishedTime as apu, article.body as abody,article.sticky as asticky,article.hits as ahits,article.postNum as aposNum,article.upsNum as aupsNum, tag.id as tid,tag.name as tname,article.picture as apicture from article,article_category,tag_owner,tag where article.categoryId=article_category.id and article.id=tag_owner.ownerId and tag_owner.ownerType='article' and tag.id=tag_owner.tagId
and article.id=#{id}
select id as aid,title as atitle,picture as apicture from article where promoted=1 order by article.publishedTime
select id as aid,title as atitle from article where featured=1 order by article.publishedTime
